responsibilities: Design, develop, and deploy production-ready solutions for customers, enabling seamless integrations with mParticle's technology and data ecosystem.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including Customer Success, Professional Services, and Production Engineering, to deliver scalable, high-quality solutions that meet customer requirements.
Build scalable integrations tailored to customer requirements and specifications.
Enhance the efficiency of Professional Services Engineering by improving documentation, tools, and reusable code templates.
Partner closely with Customer Success and Professional Services teams to ensure timely delivery of high-value solutions.
Translate customer needs into detailed technical requirements and accurately estimate development efforts.
Rigorously test and validate integrations to guarantee reliable and performant deployments.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on designing, developing, and deploying production-ready solutions, collaborating with cross-functional teams, building scalable integrations, and improving efficiency through documentation and tools. There is no mention of working with language models or tasks related to fine-tuning or customizing them for domain-specific tasks. The responsibilities are more aligned with software engineering and integration rather than machine learning or language model customization.
